jeopardy.name: REVIEWS OF FOOD WE DIDN'T EAT

questions.question: GREAT SCOTT! THIS IS THE YEAR DISNEYLAND OPENED.
IN 1972, THIS AREA OF DISNEYLAND OPENED AS "BEAR COUNTRY". IN 1988, IT WAS RENAMED TO THIS.
ONE OF THE MAIN ATTRACTIONS IN MICKEY'S TOONTOWN FAIR IS GADGET'S GO COASTER, NAMED AFTER A CHARACTER FROM THIS DISNEY AFTERNOON TV SHOW.
questions.answer: What is Chip and Dale's Rescue Rangers?

questions.question: THIS FUTURE PRESIDENT WAS AT THE OPENING OF DISNEYLAND.
THIS IS CONSIDERED THE "LOST LAND" OF DISNEYLAND OPENING ON JUNE 16, 1957 AND CLOSING IN SEPTEMBER 1961.
HOLD ON TO YOUR TASSELS! THIS IS THE NEWEST ATTRACTION IN ADVENTURELAND.
questions.answer: What is the Magic Carpets of Aladdin?

questions.question: A REPLICA OF THE HOUSE OF BURGESSES IN LIBERTY SQUARE HAS TWO LANTERNS IN THE WINDOW FOR THIS MAN'S EPIC RIDE.
THE STATUE OF ROY DISNEY AND MINNIE MOUSE HOLDS THIS TITLE.
ON OPENING DAY, THESE WERE THE ONLY TWO OPERATIONAL RIDES IN TOMORROWLAND
questions.answer: What are the Skyway and the Speedway?

questions.question: THE MAYOR OF MAIN STREET USA IS NOT JUSTIN HEYMAN, BUT RATHER THIS PERSON
THAT BIG BLUE THING THAT USED TO BE IN THE MIDDLE BLOCKING THE CHINESE THEATER. THAT WAS AN EYESORE.
THAT HOST GUY IN THE GREAT MOVIE RIDE
THAT DINOSAUR IN ECHO LAKE THAT SERVES ICE CREAM
THAT FAKE RECORD STUDIO NAME IN THE ROCK'N ROLLER COASTER
THAT GREEN SCREEN SHOW THAT USED TO BE IN WHAT IS NOW KNOWN AS THE HYPERION THEATER
ALTHOUGH THIS ANIMAL DOES NOT RESIDE IN DISNEY'S ANIMAL KINGDOM, IT WILL SOON MAKE ITS APPEARANCE AT DISNEY SPRINGS.
THIS ANIMAL IS BETTER KNOWN IN ITS ANIMATED FORM.
THIS IS TOM CORLESS'S FAVORITE ANIMAL ON KILIMANJARO SAFARIS.
ALTHOUGH THIS ANIMAL HAS LEGS THAT LOOK LIKE THAT OF A ZEBRA, IT IS ACTUALLY THE ONLY LIVING RELATIVE OF THE GIRAFFE.
YOU CAN SEE THIS BUG AROUND DISCOVERY ISLAND IN A PLEXIGLASS BOX. IF YOU HEAR ONE OUT OF THE BOX, YOU MAY WANT TO MOVE IT, MOVE IT!
questions.answer: What is the Madagascar Hissing Cockroach?

questions.question: THE CORN DOG CASTLE REIGNS SUPREME IN THIS AREA OF DISNEY'S CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE.
MONSTERS INC: MIKE AND SULLY TO THE RESCUE REPLACED THIS OPENING DAY DARK RIDE.
IT'S NOT IN FANTASYLAND ANYMORE, BUT THIS CHARACTER RESTAURANT HAS ALWAYS BEEN IN CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE WITH THE SAME NAME.
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL NIGHTTIME SHOW HELD AT DISNEY'S CALIFORNIA ADVENTURES.
CARS LAND WAS BUILT ON THE AREA OF LAND FORMERLY KNOWN AS THIS.
questions.answer: What is the Timon parking lot?

questions.question: BEFORE FASTPASS IN THE 90S, I PARTICIPATED IN A SCAVENGER HUNT AROUND ADVENTURELAND. THE WINNERS WON A CERTIFICATE TO GET TO THE FRONT OF THE LINE IN ANY RIDE. AFTERWARDS, ALL THE PARTICIPANTS GOT TO THE FRONT OF THE LINE AT THIS POPULAR ADVENTURELAND ATTRACTION.
WHEN I WAS IN WALT DISNEY WORLD WITH MY HIGH SCHOOL, WE STAYED AT THIS RESORT WITH A GIANT WOODY. THAT WAS FUNNY FOR A CLASS OF ALL TEENAGE GUYS.
I LIVE PRETTY CLOSE TO FLUSHING, THE SITE WHERE THIS EVENT HELD EARLY VERSIONS OF IT'S A SMALL WORLD, CAROUSEL OF PROGRESS, AND THE PEOPLEMOVER.
DURING TRIPS WHERE I HAVE TO WORK, I DO WORK IN THE CONTEMPORARY RESORT, USUALLY REFILLING MY DRINK MUG AT THIS QUICK SERVICE LOCATION.
I ONCE HAD LUNCH WITH AN IMAGINEER WITH THIS MAN WHO LED THE TEAM BEHIND THE LEGEND OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW.
IN A REFERENCE TO M*A*S*H, WHEN I STAYED WITH MICHAEL FOR THE 10TH ANNIVERSARY AT THIS RESORT, WE NICKNAMED IT "THE SWAMP".
THE PRESHOW AUDIO CUT OUT WHILE I WAS ON THIS EPCOT ATTRACTION, SO WE CAME UP WITH THE LINE, "IN SPACE, NO ONE CAN HEAR YOU SPIEL."
I WAS ONCE STUCK NEAR THE END OF THIS EERIE ATTRACTION WHERE A VENTRILOQUIST DUMMY WAS STARING AT ME THE WHOLE TIME. IT WAS PRETTY CREEPY.
questions.answer: What is Twilight Zone: Tower of Terror?

questions.question: THE FIRST TIME I RODE THE BUS SYSTEM FROM THIS MILITARY RESORT, I WAS SURPRISED TO FIND OUT THEY ACTUALLY RAN ON A SCHEDULE.
KALTXI MA ’EYLAN. DURING THE ORDER OF THE SEVEN GAME, I WAS STATIONED AT THIS VALLEY.
I GOT THE FIRST EVER WDWNT JEOPARDY QUESTION RIGHT, IDENTIFYING THIS SPINNING ADVENTURELAND ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is the Magic Carpets of Aladdin?

questions.question: I COULDN’T GIVE THE NAME OF THIS DINOSAUR IN HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS THAT SERVES ICE CREAM AND INCORRECTLY DESCRIBED IT AS BLOCKING THE CHINESE THEATER.
I THOUGHT THAT THIS EPCOT ICON WAS FOR THE SEAS. IT'S ACTUALLY FOR THIS ATTRACTION.
I THOUGHT THAT JIMMY CARTER WAS AT THE OPENING OF DISNEYLAND, BUT REALLY, IT WAS THIS FUTURE PRESIDENT.
I CALLED THE MEMORIAL "SHARING THE MAGIC" FEATURING THIS PERSON AND MINNIE MOUSE "ALMOST PARTNERS".
I HAVE A FEAR OF SNAKES. THIS IS THE TECHNOLOGY-RELATED NAME OF THE SNAKE THAT USED TO MAKE ME RIP MY GLASSES OF IN HONEY I SHRUNK THE AUDIENCE.
IN EPCOT, I USED TO BE ABLE TO GET INTO THE DISNEY CHASE VISA LOUNGE, LOCATED ABOVE THE AMERICAN ADVENTURE. NOW THAT IT'S THIS, I CAN'T QUITE GET IN ANY MORE.
MY WIFE ALWAYS INTENTIONALLY GOT THE NAME OF THIS HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS CAFE WRONG - THAT IS, UNTIL IT CLOSED FOLLOWING THE INTRODUCTION OF STARBUCKS ACROSS THE STREET.
I'VE BEEN INSIDE OF THE CINDERELLA CASTLE SUITE - WHICH IS GORGEOUS, BY THE WAY. IT WAS CREATED AS A PART OF THIS DISNEY PROMOTION, WHICH (CONTRARY TO ITS NAME) RAN FOR A LITTLE OVER TWO YEARS.
questions.answer: What is the Year of a Million Dreams?

questions.question: WHETHER YOU WANT A WORLD CLASS MEAL OR A FUN CHARACTER BREAKFAST, THIS MONORAIL RESORT WHERE MY WIFE AND I HAVE AS OUR DVC HOME RESORT REALLY DOES DELIVER. YOU CAN EVEN POPPIN FOR A SWIM IF YOU WANT!
WHILE WORKING AT THE MAGIC KINGDOM, I WAS ON THE OPENING TEAM FOR THIS 2001 ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is The Magic Carpets of Aladdin?

questions.question: I GOT ENGAGED AT THIS ATTRACTION WHERE I PULLED THE BRIDE'S RING OUT OF THE GROUND. ANY VOLUNTEERS?
I HAD MY TENTH BIRTHDAY AT THIS RESTAURANT THAT WAS THE PREDECESSOR TO THE CALIFORNIA GRILL?
questions.answer: What is Top of the World?

questions.question: I REALLY MISS THURSDAY NIGHT CAST MEMBER NIGHTS AT THIS PLEASURE ISLAND VENUE, THAT, AS TOM WOULD SAY, "IS STILL CLOSED, KUNGALOOSH!"
THESE TWO BIRDS WHO JOINED JOSE, PIERRE, MICHAEL, AND FRITZ IN 1998 STILL HAUNT MY DREAMS?
FOR 6 MONTHS IN 2010-2011, I WAS A PART OF THIS DISNEY PROGRAM THAT HIRES YOUNG CAST MEMBERS ON A TEMPORARY BASIS.
questions.answer: What is the Disney College Program?

questions.question: MY FIRST TRIP DOWN WAS IN 2006, WHICH WAS ALSO THE YEAR THAT THIS RIDE OPENED - WHICH HAPPENS TO STILL BE MY FAVORITE RIDE IN THE PARKS!
ONE OF MY FAVORITE PLACES ON PROPERTY IS THIS PIANO BAR LOCATED IN THE BOARDWALK AREA - I EVEN WENT THERE WEDNESDAY NIGHT WITH TOM!
LAST YEAR, I MADE A SPECIAL TRIP DOWN TO DISNEY TO SEE THIS NIGHTTIME SHOW JUST BEFORE IT CLOSED.

ONE TIME, WHEN I WAS HERE WITH MY FAMILY, THEY HAD DINING RESERVATIONS AT THIS RESORT RESTAURANT AT SWAN & DOLPHIN WHERE THEY MET TIMON AND RAFIKI. WE ALMOST MISSED THE RESERVATION THOUGH - WE WEREN'T EXPECTING TO NEED TO TAKE A BOAT FROM EPCOT!

final-jeopardy.question: TOM MET JASON AT A CJDPT PIN TRADING EVENT IN THIS STATE, AND THE REST IS WDWNT HISTORY.
